abilities.name: Rites of Battle
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when it is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Finest Hour
abilities.rule: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by this model and those weapons have the **[DEVASTATING WOUNDS]** ability.

abilities.name: Relic Shield
abilities.rule: The bearer has a Wounds characteristic of 6.
